entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Main is now targeting .NET 7 #198
    .NET 7.0

Updated

  • Main is now targeting .NET 7 #198
    .NET 7.0

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to update runtime ids using runtimeGroups.props #57702
    untriaged
  • Need to run non-English text through UTF8Encoding for PGO scenarios #57698
    tenet-performance, untriaged, runtime-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Bug report] gdi+ render bugs on unix platform #57694
    area-System.Drawing, Future
  • [mono][aot] `.aotdata` files size increase compared to _legacy_ mono #57689
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • Impossible signature padding conditions in RSAAndroid #57683
    area-System.Security, os-android, 6.0.0
  • AppModel docs and cleanup for 6.0 #57682
    area-Single-File, linkable-framework, 6.0.0
  • ETW callstacks from .NET provider contain impossible recursive frames #57675
    untriaged
  • OpenSSL 3.0 has removed `ERR_GET_FUNC` #57674
    area-System.Security, blocking-release, os-linux, 6.0.0
  • HelloiOS failing on CI with exit code 1 #57666
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Crash in common_call_trampoline due to inconsistent rgctx mode #57664
    untriaged, in pr

Updated

  • Reading configuration settings fails with System.UriFormatException: 'Invalid URI: The hostname could not be parsed.' #56897
    bug, area-System.Configuration, Future
  • Recurring test failures in tracing due to class loader alloc tracker heap corruption #57461
    arch-x86, os-windows, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • atom10itemformattertests.writeto_emptyitem_serializesexpected fails in CI #57375
    area-Serialization, untriaged
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ConstructorTests_Stream.PathForChildDictionaryFails #39055
    bug, area-System.Text.Json, blocking-release, 6.0.0
  • Feed unreliability affecting CI #55449
    tracking-external-issue, blocking-clean-ci, blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure, Future
  • system.io.pipelines.tests.flushasynctests.flushasync_throwsifwriterreaderwithexception #55435
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, disabled-test, blocking-clean-ci, 7.0.0
  • Several System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs tests fail with Internal.Cryptography.CryptoThrowHelper+WindowsCryptographicException #31281
    area-System.Security, tracking-external-issue, Future
  • runtime xunit wrapper build failed #45378
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, Future
  • Compiler crashes when failing to release Mutex #53420
    bug, os-linux, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Host tests often fail on text file busy issues #53587
    blocking-clean-ci, area-Host, 6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/5.0] Add Fedora 36 RID #57703
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • fix PYTHONPATH on Linux #57701
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from mono/linker #57700
  • Fix `ThreadPool.SetMinThreads` and `SetMaxThreads` to return false when they don't override the preconfigured value #57699
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Remove `CROSSGEN_COMPILE` define usage #57697
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr
  • Remove scripts for running CrossGen1 on SPCL #57696
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix padding mode precondition in RSAAndroid #57695
    area-System.Security
  • Delete code under FEATURE_PREJIT #57693
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr
  • Add more stress-testing for Inliner #57691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] JIT: don't clone loops where init or limit is a cast local #57690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make implicit function declaration an error #57688
    community-contribution
  • Add special Mac Catalyst values for mtriple to MonoAOTCompiler.props #57687
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, os-maccatalyst
  • [release/6.0] Fix incorrect VN when folding GT_NEG(GT_MUL(A, C)) #57686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] JIT: don't clone loops where init or limit is a cast local #57685
    blocking-release, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fix stress issues around multiple threads throwing the same exceptions #57684
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JsonPath not using last frame during continuation #57681
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [mono] Fix crash in common_call_trampoline due to inconsistent rgctx mode #57677
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix crash in common_call_trampoline due to inconsistent rgctx mode #57676
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Refactor `EQ`/`NE` morphing #57671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix crash in common_call_trampoline due to inconsistent rgctx mode #57665
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [Do Not Merge] Change the vmImage for mac to vsts-macos1015-dev temporarily #57662
    NO REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix QUIC ConnectionState NRE in HandleEventConnectionClose #57655
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • stress test sandboxing #57653
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • Extend MemoryCacheOptions with TrackLinkedCacheEntries #57648
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Refactor XmlQualifiedName #57646
    area-System.Xml

Merged

  • Remove CrossGen1 from R2RTest project #57692
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • Some cleanups in Assembly/Loader area #57023
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, auto-merge
  • [wasm][aot] Enable more passing test assemblies on AOT #57678
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries, wasm-aot-test, 7.0.0
  • Remove `FEATURE_READYTORUN_COMPILER` define from non-JIT code. #57672
    area-Interop-coreclr, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • Try to fix and enable a ThreadPool.CompletedWorkItemCount test and add more info about failures #57240
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • JIT: don't clone loops where init or limit is a cast local #57602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove usages of `FEATURE_NGEN_RELOCS_OPTIMIZATIONS` #57673
    area-Interop-coreclr, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect VN when folding GT_NEG(GT_MUL(A, C)) #57651
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Throw on invalid payload length in WebSockets #57635
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] Throw on invalid payload length in WebSockets #57636
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix Debug.Assert use of string interpolation in crossgen2 #57667
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Fix Debug.Assert use of string interpolation in crossgen2 #57668
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove workaroudn for linker issue in Http3RequestStream #57571
    area-System.Net.Http, linkable-framework
  • Delete code under `FEATURE_NATIVE_IMAGE_GENERATION` #57669
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Support reference type custom converters in source gen #57592
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Bump timeout for workloads build job #57637
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Delete code under FEATURE_PREJIT #57693
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr
  • fix PYTHONPATH on Linux #57701
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Add Fedora 36 RID #57703
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Adding null check to avoid abort when invalid IL is encountered #57522
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Make noise if trying to use the cache after it's been disposed. #57557
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from mono/linker #57700
  • Fix `ThreadPool.SetMinThreads` and `SetMaxThreads` to return false when they don't override the preconfigured value #57699
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Align DCJS with 4.8 implementation. #57533
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] JIT: don't clone loops where init or limit is a cast local #57685
    blocking-release, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Remove `CROSSGEN_COMPILE` define usage #57697
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr
  • Remove scripts for running CrossGen1 on SPCL #57696
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix padding mode precondition in RSAAndroid #57695
    area-System.Security
  • Remove too-short a timeout for a GCStress test #57245
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Add more stress-testing for Inliner #57691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Allow ConfigBinder to bind arrays to Singular elements #57204
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Give tvOS a special value for Personal/MyDocuments #57508
    os-tvos
  • Remove support for the `APP_NI_PATHS` property #57616
    area-Host, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • GC bookkeeping data structure in-place commit #52402
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove MERP crash reporting #57641
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • use ArrayPool instead of having a private buffer cache #45690
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] JIT: don't clone loops where init or limit is a cast local #57690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add special Mac Catalyst values for mtriple to MonoAOTCompiler.props #57687
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, os-maccatalyst
  • Add event to RuntimeEventSource for AppContext switches #57303
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Make implicit function declaration an error #57688
    community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement TryResolveConstraintMethodApprox corner case #1431
    area-NativeAOT
  • I cannot config rd.xml for refleaction exception. Please help me #1428
    area-NativeAOT

Closed

  • Failed to compile Giraffe #1357
    area-NativeAOT
  • ARM Linker issues #1424

Updated

  • Implement TryResolveConstraintMethodApprox corner case #1431
    area-NativeAOT
  • ARM Empty application crashed. #1426
  • I cannot config rd.xml for refleaction exception. Please help me #1428
    area-NativeAOT
  • ARM: JIT crash #1397
    area-NativeAOT

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement TryResolveConstraintMethodApprox #1430
    area-NativeAOT

Merged

  • Fix handling of constrained calls on ValueTypes #1422
    area-NativeAOT
  • Rename EEType to MethodTable #1329
  • Add required dependencies for ops in scanner on ARM #1423
  • Baseline test failing due to BinaryFormatter #1429
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • Implement TryResolveConstraintMethodApprox #1430
    area-NativeAOT

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102548-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #19861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #sdk-102550-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #19859
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet workload install creates .nuget with root permissions in clean env #19823
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • After install 6.0 Preview 7 on Mac OS, install workload maui using command line failed. #19822
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx

Closed

  • Workload: Add offline cache option to repair command #19775
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Pathmap does not seem to be working, resulting in determinism failure #15321
    untriaged
  • A referenced assembly was compiled using a newer version of Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET.dll. #19363
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102548-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #19861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract includes XML and other files into output binary #19322
    Bug, Area-ILLink, 6.0.1xx
  • Add workload force clean option #19603
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • Could add parameters(--local/remote) for workload command? #19755
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, Discussion
  • After install 6.0 Preview 7 on Mac OS, install workload maui using command line failed. #19822
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • Workloads: Ensure commands are atomic #19773
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.2xx
  • Workloads: Support custom install locations #19774
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • Workloads: Detect and wait for active installs #19770
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.2xx
  • dotnet workload install creates .nuget with root permissions in clean env #19823
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Check that SDK and app archs match before setting `DOTNET_ROOT` when using `dotnet run` #19860

    Area-CodeFlow

    Area-CodeFlow

    Area-External, 7.0.1xx

    Area-CodeFlow

    Area-CodeFlow

    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #4304
    Proposal, Proposal champion, Working Set
  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Proposal, Proposal champion, Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Clarify span safety rules for readonly receivers #5083

Merged

  • fix typo #3026

Updated

  • Clarify span safety rules for readonly receivers #5083
  • Use string interpolation and small fixes #2806
  • Add pattern-variables.md #4592
  • Fixed class name in IAsyncEnumerable example. #2173

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add integration test for Inheritance margin #55714
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Benchmark algorithm options for LongestCommonSubsequence #55712
    untriaged
  • Re-enable MetadataReference integration test #55711
    Area-IDE, Integration-Test, untriaged, Infraswat, 17.0
  • AD0001: Could not resolve type with token 01000094 from typeref (expected class 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.BaseParameterSyntax #55708
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Roslyn allows pointers to `Span<T>` if runtime assemblies are referenced directly #55707
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Internal modifier added to partial classes breaks new project creation for WinForms, WebTools and anything using partial classes in their templates #55703
    Bug, Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Urgency-Soon, 17.0
  • Unexpected logger failure when opening a solution #55702
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Introduce local doesn't use var keyword #55698
    Bug, help wanted, Area-IDE, Investigation Required, 17.0
  • CompilerGeneratedAttribute not applied to all generated functions #55697
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [CallerArgumentExpression] attribute works with any language version, changing behavior of existing code on compiler update #55695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Closed

  • Getting a message that a new .editorconfig was found and asking if I want to add it to the solution, but i already have one as part of the solution #51785
    Bug, Area-IDE, Investigation Required, Backlog
  • System.ArgumentNullException while opening .editorconfig file #53831
    Bug, Area-IDE, 17.0
  • Method group invocation syntax resolves Enumerable rather than Queryable #55325
    Area-IDE, Resolution-Not Applicable, Resolution-Not Reproducible, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.1
  • Command line way to apply code fixes #48561
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Need Design Review, Dev17 IDE Priority, Backlog
  • `TypeLoadException` resulted by using interpolated string in PowerShell #55609
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, 17.0
  • False IDE0055 warning (Fix formatting) for extended property patterns #55328
    Bug, help wanted, Area-Analyzers, Backlog
  • C# is auto-completing braces even though settings is: Off #54920
    Bug, help wanted, Area-IDE, Developer Community, IDE-CodeStyle, 17.0

Updated

  • Internal modifier added to partial classes breaks new project creation for WinForms, WebTools and anything using partial classes in their templates #55703
    Bug, Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Urgency-Soon, 17.0
  • AD0001: Could not resolve type with token 01000094 from typeref (expected class 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.BaseParameterSyntax #55708
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add integration test for Inheritance margin #55714
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flaky test: TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #52658
    Area-Compilers, Test, Infraswat, 17.0
  • Transient failure in test AsyncIteratorWithCustomCode #34207
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, 17.0
  • CompletingWithColonInMethodParametersWithNoInstanceToInsert is flaky #49400
    Area-Infrastructure, Test, Backlog
  • Roslyn failing to clean up listeners #48816
    Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Test, Backlog
  • Assertion failure in CustomAttributesBag`1.get_IsEarlyDecodedWellKnownAttributeDataComputed #49026
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Flaky test 'InteractiveHostDesktopTests.StackOverflow' #46414
    Area-Interactive, Test, Flaky, Disabled Test, Backlog
  • InteractiveHostCoreTests.Stackoverflow #53392
    Bug, Area-Interactive, Test, Disabled Test

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't add accessibility modifiers to partial classes in new documents #55713
    Area-IDE
  • Change the head of inheritance margin background to InActiveTextBox #55710
    Area-IDE
  • Implement PackageSettingsPersister.TryFetch #55709
    Area-IDE
  • Skip flaky test #55706
    Area-Interactive
  • Add feature to simplify code to use the new extended property patterns when available. #55704
    Area-IDE
  • Address Interpolated Strings test plan #55701
    Area-Compilers
  • Pass updated types to the debugger #55699
    Area-Interactive, 17.0.P4
  • Have inheritance-margin hold onto data that does *not* point back at Solution instances. #55696
    Area-IDE
  • Specify paths and shell on Windows #55694
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [LSP] Add semantic tokens caching case #55692
    Area-IDE
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously (part 2) #55687
    Area-IDE
  • KeybindingResetDetector refactoring #55686
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • fixed broken link #55693
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Add two more icons to the inheritance margin. #55383
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Treat overload with Delegate parameter as not applicable if lambda delegate type cannot be inferred #55357
    Area-Compilers, 17.0.P4
  • Use string.Format when an interpolated string part is dynamic #55642
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove unused interface #55684
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Don't consider syntax trees changed if the compilation is the same #55715
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Use directory-scoped ALCs to load analyzers in .NET Core #55098
    Area-Compilers
  • Add feature to simplify code to use the new extended property patterns when available. #55704
    Area-IDE
  • 🐇 Store weak references in s_structuresTable #55344
    Area-Compilers
  • Have inheritance-margin hold onto data that does *not* point back at Solution instances. #55696
    Area-IDE
  • Don't add accessibility modifiers to partial classes in new documents #55713
    Area-IDE
  • Change Inheritance Margin Header style #55533
    Area-IDE
  • Change the head of inheritance margin background to InActiveTextBox #55710
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow nullable suppression in patterns #54072
    Area-Compilers
  • 🧹 Services cleanup following previous review #49127
    Area-IDE
  • Update Arcade and require .NET 6 Preview 7 SDK #55681
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement PackageSettingsPersister.TryFetch #55709
    Area-IDE
  • Consider MatchPriority when comparing CompletionItems when filter text is lowercase only #55562
    Area-IDE
  • Address Interpolated Strings test plan #55701
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Reference refactoring and imports #55581
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • 🐇 Ensure recoverable syntax trees are pushed to temporary storage #55399
    Area-IDE
  • Specify paths and shell on Windows #55694
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Skip flaky test #55706
    Area-Interactive
  • Show destination name #55650
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • EnC - Tests for lambda improvements #55224
    Area-Interactive
  • Move inheritance margin to its own view margin #55674
    Area-IDE
  • Pass updated types to the debugger #55699
    Area-Interactive, 17.0.P4
  • Run dotnet-format on Roslyn #55679
    Area-Compilers
  • KeybindingResetDetector refactoring #55686
    Area-IDE
  • Update packages version #55655

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for custom model binders in minimal APIs #35472
    area-web-frameworks
  • [HTTP/3] Kestrel closes connection too soon #35470
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, HTTP3
  • Grpc Service Not Working In Visual Studio 2022 #35466
    area-grpc, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Allow @page directive in Razor Components to accept constant strings #35465
  • What to do with Microsoft.Extensions.DiagnosticAdapter dependency #35463
    area-infrastructure
  • [Templates] Readme file included when no auth is used #35462
    area-identity, feature-templates, 6.0-rc2
  • Blazor WebAssembly prerendered root component types may get trimmed away in the client build #35461
    bug, area-blazor
  • Blazor WASM: Upgrading to .NET 6 preview 7 breaks localization #35459
    area-mvc, feature-localization
  • New Service Fabric ASP.NET Core React application does not run #35458
    area-mvc
  • Publish nightly builds to an LKG location #35457
    area-infrastructure, .NET 7-Candidate

Closed

  • Verify KestrelServerLimits are enforced for HTTP/3 #29702
    area-runtime, HTTP3, 6.0-rc1
  • .Net 6 Preview 7 - Cannot set reponse headers before returning IAsyncEnumerable in controller #35364
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, area-web-frameworks
  • Ambiguous Map method with Minimal #35323
    External, feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • 404, IExceptionHandlerFeature And Response.WriteAsync: Prefixed (Corrupted) Output on .NET 5 #35469

Updated

  • [HTTP/3] Kestrel closes connection too soon #35470
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, HTTP3
  • enpoints.MapRazorPages() throwing an exception. #35365
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-mvc
  • Add support for custom model binders in minimal APIs #35472

  • Upgrade to the latest Bootstrap version #19225

  • [SignalR] IUserIdProvider's GetUserId has no async option #35417
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-signalr

    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: By Design, Status: Resolved
  • Create ConsumesRequestTypeAttribute for Minimal API endpoints #35421
    api-suggestion, 6.0-rc2
  • Service provider validation hides actual exception while adding services in ConfigureServices #30267
    servers-iis, area-runtime, feature-hosting, Backlog
  • w3wp.exe halted with unhandled exception after reboot #24997
    task, investigate, servers-iis, area-runtime, severity-nice-to-have, affected-very-few, Next sprint planning

Created

    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Identity UI Bootstrap 5.1 tweaks #35467
    area-identity

    area-runtime

Merged
